meta_description: SMCMoA is closed for exhibition installation through February 10th, 2026. Spring Exhibitions open February 11.Regular Hours: Wed-Sun, 10 a.m. to 4 p.m. Closed: Mon & Tues.museum@stmarys-ca.edu | 925-631-4379 | @smcmoa
